name: D*SCO(ep)
description:
A VIDEO GAME CONCEPT ALBUM THAT WILL TAKE YOU TO THE STARS AND BEYOND!
  • A MIXED MEDIA EXPERIENCE OVER SIX WILDLY DIFFERENT TRACKS/GAMES!
  • A SHORT & TO-THE-POINT STORY ABOUT WHATEVER YOU READ INTO IT!
  • 2D, 3D, FMV, PIXEL ART, LOW POLY, GAMEY GAMING, CONTEMPLATIVE READING, WE GOT IT ALL!
  • CRUNCHY GUITARS AND WATERY KEYS!
  • DESIGN, ART, MUSIC AND PROGRAMMING ALL BY ME! (ziad (with some help))
  • WOOF!

--- technical stuff ---

  • made in GODOT
  • entire game is played using the mouse + interact key (space bar/left mouse button)
  • game window can be resized freely and fullscreen should scale OK to arbitrary resolutions but lemme know if you run into problems
  • windows and mac builds available
  • file size is relatively massive for what it is (800mb,) it was either that, having more compressed video or video that crashes constantly lol, sorry about that!
  • you might wanna tweak your mouse sensitivity cuz i was too lazy to build in an in-game slider for it
